description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires two (2) Senior Financial Specialists (Category 3.8) under the provision of the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement details for Two (2) Senior Financial Specialists
#### Title: 
Planning for Two (2) Senior Financial Specialists
#### Reference number: 
PW-23-01025383
#### Solicitation number: 
202303081
#### Publication date: 
10 February 2023
#### Tender closing date: 
28 February 2023, 13:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the services of two (2) Senior Financial Specialists under the provision of the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement.

*Estimated level of effort: 960 (initial period) and 480 days (option periods)*

The contract will be for two years from the date of contract, with the option to extend it for up to two additional one-year periods.

*The requirement results in the award of one contract*.

This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) and is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 ($0 - $3.75M) for the *Two (2) Senior Financial Specialists (Category 3.8) category*.

#### Selection criteria: 
Technically responsive bid with lowest evaluated price.

*Classification of Service: 
*Senior Financial Specialists*
*Basis of selection: 
 Lowest evaluated price of a technically responsive bid.*

#### Level of Security: 
(Expression Minimum)
(Level of Satisfaction)
*Expression of Interest:
 Expression of interest may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Tender submission:
 Interested suppliers may obtain the bid documents and submit their bids online.

#### Contracting Authority:
 Procuring Office.
 Contracting Authority: Hannah State

*Address: 73 Leikin Dr Ottawa
 Ontario
 K1AOR2
  Canada*
*Phone: 506.238.0450*

*Contact person: Hannah State 
 E-mail:   @grc. ca 
If you are missing anything, such as bidder information form, simulation attachments, contact me so I can correct the output.
